review: I was skeptical about purchasing this, but it has worked great so far.  Now I can get Netflix, Amazon Prime videos, youtube, etc. on my TV.  My only criticism is the remote.  It is pretty flimsy, I just hope it lasts....  It was also hard to figure out how to open it to put the batteries in (believe it or not, I found a "how to" video on youtube --obviously I am not the first who struggled with this).  Other than that, great value for the price!
author: M. De Castro
